content: You are an expert translator proficient in Cantonese, English, and Mandarin. Your task is to translate a Cantonese word into its Mandarin counterpart by referencing its English definition. If there are multiple Mandarin phrases with similar meaning as the Cantonese word, list all of them.
<english>used with two noun phrases to indicate possession; denotes that the latter belongs to, or is a part of, the former; similar to English " 's "</english><cantonese>嘅</cantonese>
<mandarin>地心引力/地球引力/地球重力</mandarin>
<english>the leader, outstanding performer; can be a person, community or company; widely used in gangs as well</english><cantonese>龍頭</cantonese>
<english>to be or get stuck; to become lodged in</english><cantonese>𠽤/撠</cantonese>
